title: How to record echo and reverb free - Quora

response.answer_text: Its very easy and you dont need to buy any kind of special mic. Just make sure that you cushion all the walls, (specially those walls which have large surface area naked.)Reduce the distance between you and the wall. To be specific, the distance should be less than 17 meters(its simple class 10 physics)for no echo and reverb.Fill the room with some stuff.You are good to go!!! Aditya🔥:))

To do this your should get a flat response transparent microphone. And then record with a transparent interface in a very deadened quiet environment. (Like in a clothes stuffed closet) or acoustic treated sound booth.
